description: People will be required to wear face masks outdoors in busy areas of the French capital from Monday.
title: Coronavirus: Masks made mandatory in parts of Paris as infections rise
title_page: Coronavirus: Masks made mandatory in parts of Paris as infections rise - BBC News
maintext: "We are going to ask that [mask-wearing] become compulsory in crowded outdoor places and where respecting a metre's distance between people is difficult," said Anne Souyris, the deputy mayor in charge of health.
